gw.api.domain

Class ServiceInfoSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.ServiceInfoSource

  • public class ServiceInfoSource
extends Object
    Wrapper for class GWEnvironment (aka Libraries.ServiceInfoSource)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean BatchServer
      true if this server is a batch server. This value is determined upon initialization by checking whether this service's hostname and port, as returned by #getOutwardFacingHostname and #getOutwardFacingPort, correspond to a cluster node defined as a batch server in the system configuration, It can subsequently be modified by changing the value of the PLParameterKeys.BATCH_SERVER, for example via JMX.
      static String Env
      a String representing the configuration environment, or null if none is defined.
      static String ServerId
      a String representing the unique server ID of this instance.

      This may be defined as a System property, set at startup, or it may be associated with a URL in the config.xml registry.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

      static boolean isBatchServer()

    • Field Detail

      • BatchServer

        boolean BatchServer
        true if this server is a batch server. This value is determined upon initialization by checking whether this service's hostname and port, as returned by #getOutwardFacingHostname and #getOutwardFacingPort, correspond to a cluster node defined as a batch server in the system configuration, It can subsequently be modified by changing the value of the PLParameterKeys.BATCH_SERVER, for example via JMX.

      • Env

        String Env
        a String representing the configuration environment, or null if none is defined.

      • ServerId

        String ServerId
        a String representing the unique server ID of this instance.

        This may be defined as a System property, set at startup, or it may be associated with a URL in the config.xml registry.

        a String representing the configuration environment, or null if none is defined.

        Returns:
        a String representing the unique server ID of this instance.

        This may be defined as a System property, set at startup, or it may be associated with a URL in the config.xml registry.

      • isBatchServer

        boolean isBatchServer()
        Returns:
        true if this server is a batch server. This value is determined upon initialization by checking whether this service's hostname and port, as returned by #getOutwardFacingHostname and #getOutwardFacingPort, correspond to a cluster node defined as a batch server in the system configuration, It can subsequently be modified by changing the value of the PLParameterKeys.BATCH_SERVER, for example via JMX.
